name: Twitter retweet bot
description: A simple python bot that searches for and retweets the tweet with certain #  keyword

consumer_key.description: Enter your twitter consumer key from the app

consumer_secret.description: Enter your twitter consumer secret key from the app

access_token.description: Enter your twitter access key from the app

access_token_secret.description: Enter your twitter api secret key from the app

search_keyword.description: Enter the # you need to search and retweet eg- #cryptocurrency

sleep_time.description: Enter the wait time between 2 tweets (in secs). eg- 3600 for 1 hour

like_tweet.description: True if you want to like the tweet as well (recommended = False)

follow_user.description: True if you want to follow all the users who tweeet about your defined keyword (recommended = False)
